caption.p: Seasonal cycle of multimodel ensemble mean developed hydropower potential (DHP, MW)for the historic (1971–2000, blue) and end period (2070–2099) periods under RCP 2.6 (green) and RCP 8.5 (red) for (a) Nathpa Jhakri, (b) Bhakra Nangal, (c) Srisailam, (d) Nagarjuna Sagar, (e) Hirakud, ( f) Sardar Sarovar, and ( g) Indira Sagar. Shaded regions show intermodel variation for 10CMIP5-GCMs under RCP 2.6 (cyan) and RCP 8.5 (pink). The figure was developed using the Generic Mapping Tools (GMT) version 5.4.2 ( http://gmt.soest.hawaii.edu).
